code: export var getCurrentUnixTime=function getCurrentUnixTime(){return Math.floor(Date.now()/1000).toString();};export var epochToHumanReadableDate=function epochToHumanReadableDate(unixTime){var d=new Date(0);var seconds=Number(unixTime);if(unixTime.length>11){seconds=Math.floor(seconds/1000);}d.setUTCSeconds(seconds);return d.toString();};export var humanReadableDateToEpoch=function humanReadableDateToEpoch(datetime){var timezone=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'local';var epoch=new Date(datetime).getTime();var unixTime=Math.floor(epoch/1000);var offset=timezone==='gmt'?new Date(datetime).getTimezoneOffset()*60:0;return(unixTime-offset).toString();};
